propertyItem.value: *Information Listed above is updated periodically based on the Fund Company's schedule.
**Each reporting year will display the 'Reminder of the Year' and the 'First 60 Days' Receipts regardless of your First 60 Days filing status with Canada Revenue Agency.
To search for the First 60 Days receipt for 2008, a user would enter the reporting year 2007 and select the Refresh Button.
